title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: Liberal Senator Eric Abetz says Anthony Albanese has learnt from the mistakes of Bill Shorten by proving Labor can stand up to the unions. Mr Abetz told Sky News the Labor Leader was right to back the Coalition's trade agreements despite facing opposition from the unions. “Clearly Anthony Albanese is learning some of the lessons Bill Shorten refused to learn,” he said. “If you want to be a genuine party for government of Australia, you cannot always give in to a vested interest. “Bill Shorten and Labor over the past six years have always given into the unions. “For Mr Albanese to have taken this small step, I’ve got hope for him.”
